title: Buggy app
body: Can’t download

title: Not for older BMWs
body: Completely useless for any model before 2014. Don’t waste your time.

title: iPhone calendar
body:
I downloaded your new app and lost my ability to see my personal/work calendar. 

Went through all the steps. Shut my cell off, turned it back on 
Checked my setting for my calendar in my iPhone
Deleted the new My BMW Connect Drive app and reinstalled it. 
Checked my manage device in the car. 

The new app I believe caused me to lose one of my most used features. 

This is my second 7 Series, just ordered my wife a 2022 M440i xdrive and early next year I’m due for my 3rd 7 series. 

Not impressed.

title: Consolidate your apps
body: Please put everything into one app.

title: Silly but significant errors
body: Typos, missing end of sentences, little stuff.The biggest thing is, after it wants you to login, it’s still wants you to enter your Vin number by hand. Clearly it knows your Vin number, because you just logged in. Just another little stupid thing that makes BMW more difficult than necessary to deal with

title: Very useful!
body: Love to have it handy when I have a question about how to use the car functions!

title: Not working and fails to update
body: Opened app after not used in a while.  App needs to update.  Proceeds to delete videos etc.  Then the update fails.  No matter what I do, it will not update.  I deleted and reinstalled.  Still no joy.  Latest app message is error code 1010.  What does that mean and what can I do to get the driver’s guide accessible.  Planning a road trip and was counting on this app for assistance when needed.  Disappointed!!!

body: See above.

title: Reflection

title: Useful info, easy access, won’t rotate
body: I love having access to my manuals in my phone and iPad. My big complaint is that the app won’t rotate to portrait mode, so I’m forced to use it in landscape mode.

title: Nice concept. Videos need sound working though
body: Just downloaded this and was quite excited to learn about my new car however the videos have no sound.  I’ve tried a couple different options to get sound to play and nothing seems to work. I know these videos have audio because I have played them in the vehicle before. Hopefully someone can fix this soon.

title: Easy to use

title: Very good app bmw is great!!!!!!

title: Terrible app

title: Towing cover
body: Noticed yesterday or my husband noticed that the cover on the back bumper which is called the towing cover was missing. I googled and found that the piece comes off either by the car wash or people snatching it off your car.( I only use touch less car washes if I use car wash) I called the BMWDealership which I bought the car in December 20 from they were going to charge $53 for the cover, after talking to the nice gentleman and telling him that I googled about the towing cover and seeing where others have had The same problem and had went to their dealership and the dealership had went ahead and put one on for them .He went ahead and said he could do it this time but if it fell off again then I would be responsible in which I agreed that I would if it fell off again.  He thought it would have to be painted but it comes in the color of my bumper.

title: Disappointing to say the least

title: Best Users Manual I Have Used

Love the fact that the manual is specific to my car.  Doesn’t confuse me with details about a feature I don’t have. 

Love fact it is on my phone. So I can look up something I don’t do very often in seconds. Like setting the clock

title: No mention of check engine light
body: My check engine light is on. I searched for check engine light. There is no mention of it at all. Totally useless.

title: This app is a MUST for BMW Owners

title: Very useful

title: Great information

title: Doesn't Work

title: New owner

title: Total garbage
body: This was great and incredibly useful before they just decided to remove my car models manual for no reason. If it’s already there, why the he ll would you delete it?! Bmw is literally the worst designed and managed business I have ever had the absolute displeasure of experiencing. In every way. Who ever is in charge of car development is the stupidest person alive.

title: Can not scroll down to read text
body: Can not scroll down to read text

title: Needlessly “secure”; incomplete
body:
You have to enter a VIN to download. That’s probably for both customization and because someone in BMW is concerned about their IP. 

But it’s dumb. Suppose you have ordered a new, fantastically complex BMW and while it’s being built, want to read up on it. (Remember: RTFM.) Nope. Can’t. No VIN for an order until at least code 150. So, no downloaded OM. 

But it gets worse: even AFTER your car is built AND a VIN exists, this app is apparently disconnected from the big BMW VIN database in the sky. Despite being able to find that new VIN on every VIN decoder website the day after production completes, one STILL cannot download the OM. 

By the time one probably could, your car will have arrived and along with it, a printed book. So much for the convenience of reading up how to use iDrive or being able to see how ACC works. 

Plus, after all that, the info is both non-vehicle-specific and incomplete. 

Brain-dead. Stupid. Very BMW.

body: Good app so far I like it

title: A mediocre app just became completely useless
body:
Having the car manual at your fingertips can be useful. However, it lacked decent navigation and search capabilities. 
The latest update made it completely unusable. Does not accept the login credentials and keeps asking to create a new account or reset password.... when they work just fine to login to the connected drive services.

title: Kaput!
body:
Initially the app worked great.  It has NOT worked IN THE LAST 8 months.  I was told to delete the app and reinstall, but it did not resolve the issue.  I have periodically attempted to use, but still not working. Now 8 months later. 4/10/19, I’m now being told there is a software problem that is being worked on!  What?  For 8 months there has been software trouble?
Time to fire your IT department.  I don’t appreciate the BS excuses nor the corporate runaround.  Service is unacceptable.

title: Terrific new app!

title: Useful - beats the paper manual
body:
I initially thought “ I like this - easy to find the information you need and saves carrying the paper manual around. “ 
But then I wanted to read about the cruise control - nothing. All it does is light a symbol showing where where it is on a picture of the steering column.
When I type “cruise” into the search field - nothing
There is some vital info - where to find tyre pressures, what file to use, etc.and this shows what could be done
Other topics are also glaring absent.
So -  “needs more work”.
I’m going to continue to carry the paper manual around

title: not available e-body
body: disappointed

title: Not vehicle-specific, no tech specs
body:
I had high hopes about this app, unfortunately it is far from what I expected.
First of all, even though I inserted the VIN of my 2014 5-series, the manual shows me functions and options that are not available on my vehicle, so how can BMW claim that the user's guide is tailor-made to each vehicle?
Second, the tech specs are not available, whereas they appear in the PDF user guide that I downloaded from the site. Weird...

title: Buggy
body: I would give it just one star but it looks like it has potential, just too buggy now to other with.  Keeps locking up.

title: useless app
body: BMW... Include more models and years. What is the point if this app includes only few models. Useless...

body: Defaults to the 7 series and there is no way to change it.

title: No M3?
body: Where's the support for MY13 M3??  Just because production of the E92 has ended and the new M3/M4 is coming out, doesn't mean the old one is history.  Where's the love for the S65?

title: Excellent App
body: Works great on iphone.  Easy to find section needed.  Crashes on iPad.

title: Good Stuff
body: So far.  So good.

title: Nice!
body: With all of the new technology integrated into my BMW X5d it is nice to be able to access my smart phone on the fly instead of the manual which I don't keep in the vehicle.

title: Convenient and user friendly
body: Quick and streamlined with nice interface. Very easy to look up everything, sometimes it is impossible to find settings in idrive but this app tells all you need to know.
